definition: to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: A short seller bets that a stock price will fall.
sentences.chinese: 有一個空頭押注該公司股票價格將下跌。

sentences.english: At the same time, short-term traders bought to reverse bets that stock prices would fall.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，短線交易員逆市買入，押注股價回升。

sentences.english: In a 5 card stud game there is only one round of betting.
sentences.chinese: 在5張牌梭哈中只有一輪押注的機會。

sentences.english: IV. Winning the bet from time to time multiple lightning turn 2 or 3 times.
sentences.chinese: 中獎之押注倍數不定時閃電翻2倍或3倍。

sentences.english: Many people and institutions made leveraged bets that have since gone sour.
sentences.chinese: 許多個人和機構的槓桿押注後來都出了紕漏。

sentences.english: After all, where else would they place their asset bets?
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，中國還能將他們的資產押注在那裏？

sentences.english: He is now wagering the Aussie dollar will fall in value against other developed-market currencies.
sentences.chinese: 他目前押注澳元兌其他發達市場貨幣會貶值。

sentences.english: That bet paid off handsomely after the SNB's move.
sentences.chinese: 在瑞士央行的舉措之後，他的押注收到了豐厚回報。

sentences.english: Even then, I would not bet on such an outcome.
sentences.chinese: 即使在那種情況下，我也不會押注於這樣一個結果。

sentences.english: We think it is about the market attempting to price a breakup of the euro, ' wrote analysts Stephane Deo and Matteo Cominetta of UBS Investment Research Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲，這是市場在試圖押注歐元區解體。

sentences.english: Sichuan Tengzhong's bet is that the market can recover.
sentences.chinese: 四川騰中重工就是在押注這個市場能夠復甦。

definition: to play yabao (a gambling game)/(fig.) to gamble on/to take one's chance/to try one's luck
to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
stake (in a gamble)/(what is at) stake
to ratchet up/to raise (expectations etc)/to increase (a quota, a position in the market etc)/to up the ante/(computing) to encode
Bloomberg (name)/Michael Bloomberg (1942-), US billionaire businessman, politician and philanthropist
